actions.in_committee: House Committee on District of Columbia

official_title: To provide for the donation of public land and for a matching grant to the University of the District of Columbia to enhance the endowment and capabilities of the university.
short_title: UDC Land Transfer and Endowment Parity Act

summary.text: UDC Land Transfer and Endowment Parity Act - Directs the Mayor of the District of Columbia to convey specified lands to the University of the District of Columbia (UDC). Compensates the District of Columbia in land or appropriations for such conveyance. Authorizes FY 1989 appropriations for UDC construction of a campus on the conveyed lands. Directs the Secretary of Education to provide a grant to UDC to increase its endowment fund. Requires UDC to deposit an amount equal to one-fifth of the Federal grant into its endowment fund. Prohibits UDC from using: (1) any of the endowment fund corpus during the term of the grant, which may not exceed ten years; and (2) from using more than 50 percent of fund income during the term of the grant, unless faced with certain exigent circumstances. Requires UDC to invest the endowment fund corpus and income in low-risk securities.

titles.title: UDC Land Transfer and Endowment Parity Act
To provide for the donation of public land and for a matching grant to the University of the District of Columbia to enhance the endowment and capabilities of the university.
